channel.title: new site on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in new site on Barefoot Rob

item.title: thanks to fred for smurfing with mt3.com
item.description: 16:12 Thursday 19 July 2018 JST Fred smurfed a script for me to smurf the markdown files related to Marble Track 3 into their own directory so I can use Hugo to smurf them into a website dedicated to Marble Track 3. #!/bin/bash # # USAGE: # $0 [year] |less # visually confirm correct output # $0 [year] |bash # execute output. dangerous! # # Warning: # The output of this script is NOT protected against # funny characters in filenames or other bugs/unusual output.
